.. _latentforcemodels:

*******************
Latent Force Models
*******************

.. currentmodule:: pydygp

Somewhat loosesly a :term:`latent force model` is a time-dependent linear
Ordinary Differential Equation (ODE) where the time dependence arises from a
collection of latent Gaussian processes. We distinguish between two classes of
such models; the first is the :term:`additive` latent force model

.. math::
   
   \dot{\mathbf{x}}(t) = \mathbf{A}\mathbf{x}(t) + \mathbf{S}\mathbf{g}(t),

where :math:`\mathbf{g}(t) = (g_1(t),\ldots,g_R(t))^T`.

We also consider the class of :term:`multiplicative` latent force models

.. math::

   \dot{\mathbf{x}}(t) = \left(\mathbf{A}_0 + \sum_{r=1}^{R}g_r(t)\mathbf{A}(r)\right)\mathbf{x}(t),
